title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 612.9 - Panel attorneys
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 612.9 - Panel attorneys

State Regulations
(a) The Appellate Division, pursuant to
the provisions of the Assigned Counsel Plan, may at any time make additions to
or deletions from the panels. (b) The central screening committee may
continue to process complaints against panel attorneys which relate to the
discharge of an attorney's duties under the panel plan, and shall, in
consultation with the administrator of the Assigned Counsel Plan, and subject
to the approval of the Appellate Division, adopt rules for the processing of
such complaints. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
612.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
